mapper.select: SELECT pw.*, ps.is_checked, ps.submit_word FROM puzzle_word AS pw LEFT JOIN puzzle_status AS ps ON pw.word_id = ps.word_id AND ps.puzzle_team_id = #{teamId} WHERE pw.crossword_id = ( SELECT pt.crossword_id FROM puzzle_team AS pt WHERE pt.puzzle_team_id = #{teamId} );
select pw.word, pw.clue, pw.no, pw.orientation from puzzle_word as pw where pw.crossword_id = ( select pt.crossword_id from puzzle_team as pt where pt.puzzle_team_id = #{teamId} ) ORDER BY pw.no ASC
